Title: New York Times Silverlight Kit
Description: This is a Silverlight Kit for the New York Times Open APIs. Add this kit to a Silverlight project in Visual Studio or Expression Blend to easily access New York Times APIs for Articles, Best Sellers (books), the US Congress, Movie Reviews, Community Comments, Times Tags, etc.
HomeWiki:
Description

This is a Silverlight Kit for the New York Times Open APIs. Add this kit to a Silverlight project in Visual Studio or Expression Blend to easily access New York Times APIs for Articles, Best Sellers (books), the US Congress, Movie Reviews, Community Comments, Times Tags, etc.

New York Times Open APIs

Articles, Bestsellers, Community Comments, US Congress, Movie Reviews, Newswire, TimesPeople, TimesTags

Windows Phone 7

The New York Times Silverlight Kit is now supported on Windows Phone 7 Series.

Terms of Use

Please follow the Terms of Use for the New York Times APIs if you develop any applications using them.
